forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 9C. E winds shifting to NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 49F. E winds shifting to NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 4C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 39F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 9C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 34F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High 49F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 36F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. High around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High around 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime after midnight. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers late. Low around 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear during the evening followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
